cast.overview: In post-Sept. 11 Los Angeles, tensions erupt when the lives of a Brentwood housewife, her district attorney husband, a Persian shopkeeper, two cops, a pair of carjackers and a Korean couple converge during a 36-hour period.
cast.title: Crash

cast.overview: An ordinary man frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.
cast.title: Falling Down

cast.overview: Former Marine Louanne Johnson lands a gig teaching in a pilot program for bright but underachieving teens at a notorious inner-city high school. After having a terrible first day, she decides she must throw decorum to the wind. When Johnson returns to the classroom, she does so armed with a no-nonsense attitude informed by her military training and a fearless determination to better the lives of her students -- no matter what the cost.
cast.title: Dangerous Minds

details.biography:
Karina Arroyave (born July 16, 1969) is a Colombian television and film actress, likely best known as Jamey Farrell in 24.

She has appeared in a total of 3 "dedicated teacher" films where the teacher tries to get the inner city students to want to learn (One Eight Seven, Dangerous Minds and Lean on Me). She also had a role in Crash as wife of Daniel, the Latino locksmith.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Karina Arroyave, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Karina Arroyave
